channel.title: Do handlers increase or decrease lag?
channel.description:
Hi,
Do handlers [b]increase[/b] or [b]decrease[/b] lag? Please vote in the poll,
People may think handlers reduce lag, but people say that in increases lag, because your server has to take lots of roots to the files.
Please vote and post accordingly.
Thanks

item.title: Do handlers increase or decrease lag?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Agreed 90%, i’m not so sure

Read full topic
item.source: Do handlers increase or decrease lag?

item.title: Do handlers increase or decrease lag?
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

They decrease because they take strain off of the client class and any other class files that you make a handler for. But im sure if your handler gets too big, it will lag.

Read full topic
item.source: Do handlers increase or decrease lag?
